T02D2325:266b-1: ma h'a mu dra tattva n'aksha ro pa de sha //
T02D2325:266b-3: de kho na nyid phyag rgya chen po yi ge
T02D2325:266b-4: med pa'i man ngag /'jam dpal smra ba'i seng ge
T02D2325:266b-6: grub thob dam pa brgyad cu rtsa bzhi las //
T02D2325:266b-7: skyes bu khyad par rig 'dzin lnga yi gzhung //
T02D2325:266b-8: mchog gyur rnams kyi zhabs kyi rdul la reg / de phyir dpe bral phyag rgya chen po bshad //
T02D2325:266b-9: rnam gcod dang ni yongs gcod dang //
T02D2325:266b-10: phung po gsum bo sel ba dang //
T02D2325:266b-11: don dam mjal ba'i tshad ma yis //
T02D2325:266b-12: yang dag yid la lta ba bya //
T02D2325:266b-13: yang dag don la yi ge med //
T02D2325:266b-14: gang gis yi ge med shes pa //
T02D2325:266b-15: de yis yi ge thams cad shes //
T02D2325:266b-16: yi ge aa nas ksha la rdzogs //
T02D2325:266b-17: sde tshan brgyad kyi sgra sbyor ni //
T02D2325:266b-18: a'a li k'a lir shes par bya //
T02D2325:266b-19: ma skyes pa dang ma 'gag pa //
T02D2325:266b-20: zung 'jug mtha' bzhi bral ba yi //
T02D2325:266b-21: bde ba chen po rgyun chags su //
T02D2325:266b-22: bla ma'i brda yis mtshon par bya //
T02D2325:266b-23: kha dog mar me me long rgya //
T02D2325:266b-24: me shel sa bon skyur dang sgra //
T02D2325:266b-25: brgyad pa 'di ru don bsdus pa //
T02D2325:266b-26: go ba cig shos skye bar 'gyur //
T02D2325:266b-27: aindra bh'u ti bdag med ma //
T02D2325:266b-28: lhan cig skyes sbyor 'dod yon grol //
T02D2325:266b-30: bden don rtogs pa 'phags pa lha //
T02D2325:266b-31: sngog dang rtsol ba n'a ga pa //
T02D2325:266b-32: phyi nang rlung gsum tshangs par 'dren //
T02D2325:266b-34: bde bas rgyas pa'i za ma tog / sku gsum mnyam gzhag mda' bsnun na //
T02D2325:266b-35: dran med skye med blo las 'das //
T02D2325:266b-36: mnyam gzhag dang ni rjes thob dang //
T02D2325:266b-37: rmi lam dang ni bar do la //
T02D2325:266b-38: zin dang brtan dang bogs 'byin pa //
T02D2325:266b-39: rgyas gdab pa dang rnam pa bzhi //
T02D2325:266b-40: dang po dus bzhi mnyam sbyar la //
T02D2325:266b-41: gnad gsum gzer bzhi gdab par bya //
T02D2325:266b-42: lus kyi gnad dang dmigs pa'i gnad//
T02D2325:267a-0: @267a * // rlung gi gnad ni shes par bya //
T02D2325:267a-1: rig pa gcur la gdab pa dang //
T02D2325:267a-2: shes pa srang du gzhug pa dang //
T02D2325:267a-3: sems ni rung dmigs 'dren pa dang //
T02D2325:267a-4: rten dang dbral zhing bsgom pa gces //
T02D2325:267a-5: ae wam brgyan pa'i bde ba la //
T02D2325:267a-6: bde bas byang chub lam du kyer //
T02D2325:267a-7: snang srid brda ru slob pa dang //
T02D2325:267a-8: gang mthong phyag rgya chen por shar //
T02D2325:267a-9: thams cad ro mnyam de bzhin nyid //
T02D2325:267a-10: gcig zos pa yis gzhan kun grol //
T02D2325:267a-11: ji ltar chu bo'i rgyun bzhin du //
T02D2325:267a-12: rnal 'byor ma yengs rgyun du bsgom //
T02D2325:267a-13: gzung ba dang ni sbyang ba dang //
T02D2325:267a-14: sgyu ma dang ni kho na nyid //
T02D2325:267a-15: nyal dang log pa'i khyad par las//
T02D2325:267a-16: rmi lam man dag shes par bya //
T02D2325:267a-17: da lta 'chi kha bar do la //
T02D2325:267a-18: rten dang 'ong dang thig le sems //
T02D2325:267a-19: grong 'pho'i man ngag shes pa yis //
T02D2325:267a-21: don mthong pa yis sgro 'dogs chod //
T02D2325:267a-22: nyams su blangs na byin rlabs 'byung //
T02D2325:267a-23: drod rtags nus pa tshod zin pas //
T02D2325:267a-24: yid bzhin nor bu lta bu'o //
T02D2325:267a-25: rlung mkhris bad kan 'dus pa'i nad //
T02D2325:267a-27: dal yams 'brum po chu ser la //
T02D2325:267a-28: ting 'dzin me btsa' skyugs kyis zhi //
T02D2325:267a-29: bdud dang mu stegs tshe 'phrul gtong //
T02D2325:267a-31: gnod sbyin 'khu ldog byed pa'i tshe //
T02D2325:267a-32: mi g-yo rgya mtsho lta bu gzhag / me dang chu dang dug sbrul dang //
T02D2325:267a-33: bse dang chom rkun rgyal po'i chad //
T02D2325:267a-34: stag dang dred mo gcan gzan khro //
T02D2325:267a-36: dgod dang rtsed mo byed pa dang //
T02D2325:267a-37: dal dang drag dang shin tu drag / zang zing longs spyod mang po la //
T02D2325:267a-38: sbyor ba 'di yis khyab na bde //
T02D2325:267a-39: ro snyoms gtum mo mkha' spyod dang //
T02D2325:267a-40: sman dang bcud len bdud rtsi bsten //
T02D2325:267a-41: ro langs mkha' 'gro dngos grub ster //
T02D2325:267a-42: blang dor med pa'i sems kyis 'bad //
T02D2325:267a-43: mtha' rgyas gnyis kyis shan phye la //
T02D2325:267a-44: khar phog car phog thog babs su //
T02D2325:267a-45: thun dang bcud kyis rtsal sbyangs te //
T02D2325:267a-46: snang gsum sbyor ba bskyed pa'i phyir //
T02D2325:267a-47: dbang po gsum gyis dam mi 'da' //
T02D2325:267a-48: ma 'khrul gsum gyis so thub ste //
T02D2325:267a-49: srog 'dzin gsum gyis brtan pa thob //
T02D2325:267a-50: grol lugs gsum gyis tshad bstan no //
T02D2325:267b-0: lo zla gsum @267b gyis zad sar bskyal //
T02D2325:267b-1: 'gro ba sdug bsngal 'khor bar bying ba la //
T02D2325:267b-2: ma rig mig 'byed zhi byed 'di bkod pas //
T02D2325:267b-3: phyi nang gsang ba kho na nyid rtogs te //
T02D2325:267b-4: kun gyis phyag rgya chen po thob par shog /
T02D2325:267b-5: de kho na nyid phyag rgya chen po yi ge
T02D2325:267b-6: med pa'i man ngag rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen
T02D2325:267b-7: po ka ma la sh'i las mdzad pa rdzogs so
T02D2325:267b-9: / // / rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzny'a na gu hya dang /
